amendment.description: To ensure that individuals can keep their health insurance coverage.

action.text: Amendment SA 2919 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 2919 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 54. Record Vote Number: 327.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 302(f) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2919.
Amendment SA 2919 proposed by Senator Baldwin to Amendment SA 2916. (consideration: CR S8354-8355) To ensure that individuals can keep their health insurance coverage.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 2919 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 54. Record Vote Number: 327.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2919 proposed by Senator Baldwin to Amendment SA 2916.
